description:
A premium diamond stone lets you create the perfect edge finish on your skis or board. The Swiss-made diamond sheets are mounted on highly precise injection-moulded polycarbonate backers. The colour-coded backers help you select the right grit for the job at hand. The diamond cluster pattern lasts longer than conventional diamond sheets and makes for an easier cleaning job.

  • Polycarbonate backing plates are flat and very precise
  • Available in extra-coarse (100-grit), coarse (200-grit), medium (400-grit), fine (800-grit) and extra-fine (1500-grit)
name: Tools4Boards PRECO Ski and Snowboard Diamond Stone
